name: VinayRas Infotech
overview:
Established in 2005, VinayRas Infotech is a Software Company based in Nagpur, India.

We offer custom software development and web development. We work on Open Source Technologies and are experts in programming web applications using PHP and MySQL.

Our competence and experience ensure that we deliver excellent services and products to our customers. At every stage of the development process, from conceptual design to product release, the highest quality standards are maintaine

The driving force behind our success is the consistent team work of our employees. Together with our shared value system of commitment to excellence, closeness to customers and the spirit of innovation.

We have been helping our clients, from across the globe in determining their web development needs, performing web programming services which involving database, delivering web site and ensuring it is up and running.

We Provide Following Services:

* Web Application Development (LAMP)
* Graphic Designing
* E-Commerce Solutions
* Web hosting & Domain Name Registration
* Linux Consultation
* Technical Support

* PHP/MySQL
* AJAX / Web 2.0
* Drupal
* OsCommerce
* SMS Solutions

* Human Resource Solutions
* WAP applications
* Dynamic PDF Generation
* Payment Gateways
* Content Management System
